projects.title: Vizhinjam International Deepwater Multipurpose Seaport
projects.description: India's first deep-water container transshipment hub located in Thiruvananthapuram. Designed to accommodate mother vessels and reduce dependency on foreign ports for transshipment. Identified as a priority project under Maritime India Vision 2030.
projects.impact: Expected to revolutionize India's maritime landscape, attract ₹25,000 crore investment in the region, and create a commercial corridor.

projects.title: Smart City Thiruvananthapuram
projects.description: Comprehensive urban development project under the Smart Cities Mission. Includes 79 projects such as Integrated Command and Control Centre (IC4), smart roads, multi-level car parking, water management, and e-governance solutions.
projects.impact: Improved urban infrastructure, traffic management, and civic services.

projects.title: Digital Science Park
projects.description: India's first third-generation digital science park located at Technopark Phase IV (Technocity). Focuses on AI, robotics, electronics, and other deep-tech domains. Features a 'triple helix' model integrating universities, industry, and government.
projects.impact: Expected to position Kerala as a knowledge economy hub and attract multinational partnerships.

projects.title: Technocity (Technopark Phase IV)
projects.description: A 390-acre integrated IT township in Pallipuram. Houses the Digital Science Park, Kerala University of Digital Sciences (Digital University), TCS Aerospace Hub, and Suntec campus.
projects.impact: Expands the IT corridor from Kazhakootam, creating a major hub for emerging technologies.

projects.title: Thiruvananthapuram International Airport Expansion (Project Anantha)
projects.description: Major expansion plan to increase the airport area from 45,000 sq m to 165,000 sq m and passenger capacity to 12 million annually.
projects.impact: Enhanced air connectivity and passenger handling capacity.

projects.title: Capital City Region Development Programme (Outer Ring Road)
projects.description: Construction of a 78 km, 6-lane outer ring road from Vizhinjam to Navayikulam. The project includes developing special investment zones, knowledge hubs, and industrial parks along the corridor.
projects.impact: Decongestion of the capital city and economic development of the Vizhinjam hinterland.

projects.title: Government Medical College Thiruvananthapuram Master Plan
projects.description: Comprehensive development of the Medical College campus, including new OP blocks, surgical wards, trauma care, and road infrastructure. Funded by KIIFB.
projects.impact: Modernization of the state's premier medical institution.

projects.title: Karamana - Kaliyikkavila Highway Widening (Phase I Reach II)
projects.description: Four-laning of the Pravachambalam to Vazhimukku stretch of the National Highway, including the Balaramapuram underpass.
projects.impact: Reduces traffic congestion on the southern entry to the city.

projects.title: Sreekariyam Flyover
projects.description: Construction of a flyover at Sreekariyam junction to ease traffic congestion, integrated with the proposed Light Metro alignment.
projects.impact: Traffic decongestion in a major bottleneck area.

projects.title: Pattom Flyover
projects.description: Proposed flyover at Pattom junction to alleviate heavy traffic congestion.
projects.impact: Traffic improvement in the city center.

projects.title: Ulloor Flyover
projects.description: Proposed flyover at Ulloor junction, a critical intersection near the Medical College.
projects.impact: Reduced travel time and congestion.

projects.title: Peroorkada Flyover
projects.description: Two-lane flyover construction at Peroorkada junction to manage high traffic volume.
projects.impact: Improved traffic flow on the SH-2 route.

projects.title: Vattiyoorkavu Junction Development
projects.description: Comprehensive improvement of Vattiyoorkavu Junction and connected roads, including land acquisition and rehabilitation of traders.
projects.impact: Urban renewal and traffic decongestion.

projects.title: Bio 360 Life Sciences Park
projects.description: A dedicated park for life sciences and biotechnology industries at Thonnakkal. Includes the Institute of Advanced Virology and Medical Devices Park (MedSpark).
projects.impact: Promotes research and manufacturing in biotechnology and medical devices.

projects.title: Institute of Advanced Virology (IAV)
projects.description: A specialized research institution established in the Bio 360 Life Sciences Park to study viral infections and develop diagnostics and vaccines.
projects.impact: Strengthens the state's capability to handle viral outbreaks like Nipah and COVID-19.

projects.title: KINFRA Film and Video Park Phase II
projects.description: Construction of a Standard Design Factory (SDF) building to meet the demand from IT and ITeS industries, focusing on visual media and animation.
projects.impact: Creates employment and infrastructure for the media and entertainment sector.

projects.title: Unity Mall
projects.description: A commercial complex at Technopark to promote One District One Product (ODOP) and GI-tagged products.
projects.impact: Boosts marketing of local artisanal and traditional products.

projects.title: Hill Highway Thiruvananthapuram Reach
projects.description: Development of the Hill Highway stretches including Kallikkadu to Parassala, Peringammala to Vithura, and Vithura to Bonacaud.
projects.impact: Improves connectivity in the high ranges and boosts tourism.

projects.title: Coastal Highway Thiruvananthapuram Reach
projects.description: Construction of the Coastal Highway stretches: Reach 1 (Pozhiyoor to Kovalam), Reach 2 (Kumarichantha to Pallithura), and Reach 4 (Onnampalam to Kappil).
projects.impact: Enhances coastal connectivity and tourism.

projects.title: State-of-the-Art Elephant Rehabilitation Centre, Kottoor
projects.description: Upgradation of the elephant rehabilitation centre to international standards with modern facilities for elephant care and tourism.
projects.impact: Conservation of elephants and promotion of eco-tourism.

projects.title: Travancore Heritage Project
projects.description: Conservation and beautification of heritage structures in Thiruvananthapuram city, including illumination.
projects.impact: Preservation of heritage and promotion of cultural tourism.

projects.title: Akkulam Lake Rejuvenation
projects.description: Comprehensive project to rejuvenate Akkulam Lake and its watershed, focusing on pollution abatement and tourism development.
projects.impact: Ecological restoration and creation of a recreational space.

projects.title: Development of Kovalam and Adjacent Beaches
projects.description: Infrastructure development and beautification of Kovalam and surrounding beaches to enhance tourist experience.
projects.impact: Boosts the tourism potential of Kerala's premier beach destination.

projects.title: Neyyar Alternative Water Source Project
projects.description: Project to bring water from Neyyar Dam to PTP Nagar to augment the city's water supply.
projects.impact: Ensures drinking water security for Thiruvananthapuram city.

projects.title: Kerala Arts and Crafts Village, Vellar
projects.description: A cultural hub established to promote traditional arts and crafts of Kerala, providing a platform for artisans.
projects.impact: Revitalization of traditional crafts and tourism.

projects.title: Parvathy Puthanar Rejuvenation
projects.description: Cleaning and making the Parvathy Puthanar canal navigable as part of the West Coast Canal project.
projects.impact: Restoration of a historic waterway for tourism and transport.

projects.title: Solar City Project
projects.description: Installation of solar panels on rooftops of households and government buildings across Thiruvananthapuram corporation to promote renewable energy.
projects.impact: Installed 17.1 MW capacity in 514 buildings, promoting green energy.

projects.title: Chitranjali Studio Film City
projects.description: Modernization and expansion of Chitranjali Studio into a full-fledged Film City.
projects.impact: Supports the film industry and tourism.

projects.title: Development of General Hospital Thiruvananthapuram
projects.description: Infrastructure development including new blocks and modern equipment for General Hospital Thiruvananthapuram.
projects.impact: Improves healthcare facilities for the public.

projects.title: APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University Campus
projects.description: Establishment of a permanent campus for the university at Vilappilsala.
projects.impact: Provides a centralized academic hub for technical education.

projects.title: Smart Anganwadis
projects.description: Construction of child-friendly smart anganwadis with modern amenities. The first one was constructed in Thiruvananthapuram.
projects.impact: Improved early childhood care and education facilities.

projects.title: East Fort - Manacaud Flyover
projects.description: Proposed flyover to ease traffic in the heritage zone of East Fort.
projects.impact: Traffic decongestion in the city's commercial heart.

projects.title: Punargeham Project (Thiruvananthapuram)
projects.description: Rehabilitation housing for fisher families living in coastal erosion zones. Flats constructed at Valiyathura, Karodu, and Beemapally.
projects.impact: Safe housing for vulnerable coastal communities.

projects.title: G V Raja Centre of Excellence Sports Facility
projects.description: Development of modern sports facilities at the G V Raja Sports School in Menamkulam.
projects.impact: Promotes sports education and training.

projects.title: Muttathara Housing Project
projects.description: Construction of 400 housing units for the rehabilitation of fishermen families at Muttathara.
projects.impact: Provides secure housing for the fishing community.

projects.title: Kanakakunnu Palace Conservation
projects.description: Conservation and restoration of the heritage Kanakakunnu Palace and its premises.
projects.impact: Preservation of cultural heritage.

projects.title: Karode Comprehensive Drinking Water Project
projects.description: Large scale drinking water supply scheme for Karode and surrounding areas.
projects.impact: Ensures potable water supply to rural areas.

projects.title: Kerala Genome Data Centre
projects.description: Establishment of a genome data center at Technocity to utilize Kerala's biodiversity for research.
projects.impact: Advances research in genomics and biodiversity.

projects.title: Venjaramoodu Flyover
projects.description: Construction of a flyover at Venjaramoodu junction on the MC Road.
projects.impact: Traffic relief on a major state highway.

projects.title: Sabarimala Edathavalam (Kazhakootam)
projects.description: Construction of a pilgrim shelter (Edathavalam) at Kazhakootam for Sabarimala pilgrims.
projects.impact: Improved amenities for pilgrims.
